meanings.sent1: She botanizes in the garden every morning, observing the different types of flowers.
meanings.sent2: The scientist botanizes various species of plants to understand their characteristics.
meanings.sent3: He botanizes so much that he can now identify most plants just by looking at them.
meanings.sent4: Her mind botanizes through the vast knowledge of plant species she has acquired over the years.
meanings.sent5: The young botanist botanizes diligently, hoping to make new discoveries in the world of plants.

meanings.definition: the act of examining plants in their natural habitat
meanings.sent1: During the nature walk, the students botanize the different plants they encounter along the trail.
meanings.sent2: The botanist enjoys botanizing in the forest, discovering new plant species.
meanings.sent3: As they botanize through the jungle, they stumble upon a rare and exotic flower.
meanings.sent4: The explorer's eyes botanize the lush vegetation, searching for any unique plant species.
meanings.sent5: In her dream, she botanizes through a magical garden filled with mystical plants.
